meanings.sent1: The little mouse felt gutsier when it stood up to the big cat.
meanings.sent2: She became gutsier as she faced her fears head-on.
meanings.sent3: The tiny ant looked gutsier than the huge elephant in the circus.
meanings.sent4: Her gutsier attitude shone like a bright light in the dark room of doubt.
meanings.sent5: The gutsier decision to climb the mountain left a lasting impression on her.

meanings.definition: Having more courage or determination than someone else
meanings.sent1: He was gutsier than his friends when it came to trying new things.
meanings.sent2: The team captain was gutsier than any other player on the field.
meanings.sent3: The squirrel was gutsier than the other animals in the forest when it came to collecting nuts.
meanings.sent4: Her gutsier approach to problem-solving set her apart from the rest of the group.
meanings.sent5: The gutsier decision to speak up in the meeting made a significant impact on the outcome.
